entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baie-Comeau Airport 10:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries and rain showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
